website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality disposable wrap for those "just in case" moments.
pros: These disposable wraps come in a fun polka dot pattern
If the wraps remain unsoiled they can easily be used again
The fit is comfortable, but snug enough that your furry friend won't slide out
Disposable wraps are an excellent way to see if wraps are suitable for your pup, before committing to a more expensive reusable alternative
cons: Disposable wraps are more wasteful than their reusable competitors

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION
customer_reviews.text: I have used every single wrap on the market on my senior dog. Disposable and nondisposable. My search for the perfect wrap for my dog is over. These are unbelievably amazing! The velcro is across the entire edge of wrap, not the tab type. Easily reusable if not soiled. I am beyond happy and they are the least expensive also.
customer_reviews.author: Azmiranda

customer_reviews.title: Why did you change a perfect product.
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 packs of these on my subscribe and save. I bought my first pack 2 years ago at a large superstore but found them cheaper on Amazon I noticed a change 2 months ago and thought it was a fluke they no longer stick. I now have to open them up and use tape to keep them on Such a disappointment. Guess I will have to find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Not enough books will ever be written

customer_reviews.title: HERE IS MY "RAP" ABOUT WRAPS
customer_reviews.text: GREAT ITEM. i HAVE TRIED THEM ALL. I USE THEM EVERY DAY FOR MY OLD DOGGIE.....THE PRICE IS FAIR. JUST DON'T JACK IT UP JUST BECAUSE THEY ARE SELLING WELL!! I PUT AN INEXPENSIVE WAL-MART BRAND "SUPER" PANTY LINER PAD INSIDE AND GET DOUBLE FROM ONE WRAP. SAVES ME MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: ONEHIFIGUY WORLD

customer_reviews.title: These Are A Life Saver (for our dog)
customer_reviews.text: We have a six-year old, 9 pound poodle with a penchant for spite. Cutest little guy in the world, Ted is fixed, playful and happy... BUT, if he's not the center of the world, he will pee - on walls, doors... These wraps are fantastic! Ted, fortunately, wears them like a champ... and doesn't try to rip them off - which is a definite plus. Sometimes he's dry for 8 hours at a time, sometimes he pees every couple of hours. But these have made all of our lives much happier. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: I like these better than the more expensive brand
customer_reviews.text: I like these better than the more expensive brand. They have a strip to secure it rather than 2 tabs. The elastic keeps everything in its place.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Fits okay but sometimes they pop open
customer_reviews.text: This was our first experience with male wraps. When I took it out of the package it seemed ok, just a little odd looking. The wrap fits around him and closes properly, but they seem to fit weird. The closure doesn't stay closed very long for some reason. They don't absorb as much as I had hoped. In the end, I bought a cloth wrap and self-adhesive maxi pads and they stay closed better and absorb better. The OUT! wraps will work well when we need something more disposable, but we won't rely on them all the time. They are okay.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did exactly what I was hoping.
customer_reviews.text: The solution I needed for a visit where marking/over-marking/over-marking created issues for my 8 mo male pup on a previous visit. I used the wrap under the surgisuit that he tolerates well and had no issues at all. Upon removing the wrap, I could see that he still thought he should mark over the resident male's area. So happy that I went prepared. Fortunately, this is the only house where he has seen the need to do this, but I keep them handy for visits to homes that have male canine residents. The wraps were easy to put on and take off and a great solution for this difficult problem.
customer_reviews.author: desertsand

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver male dog wrap!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've a male dog that has needed a wrap. Thankfully, I not only found this product, but it has paid for itself every time I put one on my 15 year old rescue Bichon Frise. I think he marks out of habit, but with this wrap on, he doesn't ruin any furniture or walls and he can still hike his leg all he wants! It's easy enough to put on and take off/replace and I make sure his covered area is kept clean with diaper wipes between his wrap time. Great product for that senior, or untrained, male dog in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Warner

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: A medium was good for my 12 pound Yorkie-Pom! It fit around his waist nicely and seemed to hold up well. I like the design too. Better than the plain white diaper looking ones.
customer_reviews.author: CountryBelle1

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this wrap!  Will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: They fit better than the Vet ones I purchased, and are cuter (with little blue dots) -- I can use the same one for days, taking off when he's sleeping or outside--because the adhesive remains sticky. It's lightweight and he doesn't seem to mind wearing it as when I get it out, he comes to me and turns around for me to put it on. I make sure to spread it open and wrap around "it" securely or the "anatomy part" will come out and then it is of course, not doing its job!
customer_reviews.author: Constance Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They are the most affordable ones I have found on Amazon, especially since you can get them through the Subscribe & Save program. They fit my 12 lb Pekingese perfectly with room to spare. The Velcro-type fastening works well and can be opened and reattached multiple times. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny Mama

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my puppy! We have been trying to potty train our small puppy. During the day no accidents but at night it’s a hit or miss. We put this on our little guy before bed and if there is an accident the diaper holds it; no leaks. DISCLAIMER: If your puppy is like mine he licks himself after going. We wonk up one morning to see pieces of the diaper shredded from where he was licking. To keep him from destroying the diaper we put a small piece of tape on the outside of the diaper (in the center) and it keeps him from destroying the diaper!
customer_reviews.author: Joslynn91

customer_reviews.title: Helped when we needed them
customer_reviews.text: got these for our rat terrier who had developed issues with bladder control. I got the small ones not paying attention when I ordered that I could choose sizes. They were barely big enough to get around him well. The adhesive is pretty light weight. We ended up using tape to try and keep it around him and I then purchased a reusable/washable version to place over it. He still managed to slide out of both in the middle of the night which meant doing a lot of extra laundry. Measure your dog's girth before ordering and I would use these with an additional reusable diaper to save on leaks. They are very absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: mammasawnT

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for the Price ... BUT YOU MAY NEED TAPE TOO
customer_reviews.text: Please note the date on all the 5 star ratings ... most are from 2016 or 2017. At some time since then the manufacturer changed parts of the wrap, so the "fur safe" tabs don't always hold. These are a GREAT PRODUCT for a very low price ... you just need to remember that you may need to apply some kind of tape on the tabs every once in awhile to help keep them in place, so be sure to buy some at the same time if you don't already have some kind of tape on hand (I use blue painters tape which is inexpensive and easily removed).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SUPER Absorbent!!
customer_reviews.text: My rescue pup gets very excited and "leaks" a little!! These are perfect for him as he really can't control it and if he does tinkle, he doesn't cower and feel like he's in trouble. We're working on eventually getting him out of them but for now they are a sense of comfort for him. They are super absorbent and seem very comfortable on him. They have a velcro like closure so it can be custom fit to your pups waist. I love that they have a yellow line that turns blue if he does happen to have an accident so I can physically see it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: These are great.
customer_reviews.text: It took using a few of these to perfect their use. The yellow line changing to blue is helpful. I only need to occasionally check to make sure the wrap is correctly situated to catch all the urine. Very little need for cleanup now that I’m putting them on properly. The Velcro style fastener is awesome, it allows me to check, realign, and adjust the wrap around his hips multiple times without loss of hooking. The reason I need to adjust is not due to the wrap, but due to my pug boy not having the hips to hold it in place. Repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Kambarn

customer_reviews.title: Not good for a truly medium sized dog
customer_reviews.text: So the old version of the product is great this is for the new sizing of M/L. I have stubborn Cocker Spaniel who has more urine than pissed off bull and he hates wearing diaper wraps. The original Medium size would fit him perfectly and stay on all day while I was work and absorb everything they were a Godsend but this new merged size falls off of him and he can easily take it off because it's too big for a truly medium sized dog. I'm really disappointed with the manufacturer changed the sizing on this now it's back to the drawing board for potty training.
customer_reviews.author: stilt

customer_reviews.title: Not Leak Proof
customer_reviews.text: Diapers are easy to use. I did tape it up the first time after reading some reviews of people saying the diapers didn’t stick. However, the second time our dog leaked right through the diaper. The diaper caught a lot of it but we still had a mess to clean up when we came home. The diaper also didn’t change color. They are easy to use and I’m going to try to keep giving them a chance (since I have quite a few left that I paid for), but I’m annoyed it couldn’t contain his entire mess.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey New

customer_reviews.title: Marriage saver
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Pomeranian who ignored all attempts at potty training. He simply wanted to mark all over the house to ensure his territory was well known. These diapers are gold. Every time he lifts his leg, I do not have to worry about cleaning or if he’s damaging the house or air quality. Should have bought these years ago!!! Easy to put on and easy to store in bulk. He initially try to scratch it off but quickly gave up. Everyone, including Mr. Marker, are living happily ever after.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette

customer_reviews.title: Good value for now!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good quality, secure fit The other reviews said they run small so I ordered a medium for my 17 pound Dachshund and they fit great. I also see complaints that they were not available on Prime but at the time I purchase them they were on Prime. I was using another brand available on Amazon but frankly I got tired of him jacking up their price without Rhyme or Reason, one day it's a good price the next day it's $4 higher no thank you! If this seller leaves this product at this price AND on Prime then I will be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Lee

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. I don't think my dog successfully peed a single one of these. I watched him pee and it was just pouring out of the diaper. Took off the diaper and it was magically dry!!! WTF?!?!?! Switched to the female version and he seems more comfortable and little to no leaking.
customer_reviews.author: WBA

customer_reviews.title: Excited to find the larger size male wraps
customer_reviews.text: I have two elderly dogs, and I have been able to buy the proper size female diapers locally for years. But for some reason I could only find the small/medium size for male wraps. I’ve tried to make those work for years by taping them, etc. I was thrilled to be able to find this larger size of male wraps. My dogs are wonderful, just old, and if using these diapers extends our time together it’s well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: BT34

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver! No more cleaning up little accidents from my senior dog. I was about to pull my hair out due to his little accidents that he really could not help, he’s older and his bladder control isn’t as good as it use to be. Every time I turned around it seemed like he had tinkled somewhere but these diapers have lessened the worry of constantly cleaning up after accidents. They work great!! Super absorbent
customer_reviews.author: vern

customer_reviews.title: Great doggie diapers
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie was about 13 when he finally became incontinent. Having wee wee pads all over the place was not a good look (and he still managed to pee outside of the pads) so I looked into diapers. These definitely helped a lot and was concerned about the fit, comfort factor, and if they would fall off. He was a 10-12 lb Yorkie and he took to them right away. They fastened well and there was never any leakage problems. You just need to make sure you get the feel for how snug to fasten them. Don't leave them on all day because they can get doggie rash. Would definitely recommend these diapers.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Good but breathable
customer_reviews.text: They work well. I went one size up to have more wrap around my boy's waist. They absorb well, so far no leaks, but they are plastic and not breathable. I use them to take my boy our of our apartment building to avoid accidents. But they would be hot and make him humid if left on for prolonged periods of time. I guess it just depents on what you want to use them for.
customer_reviews.author: Timber's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: This is the first male dog rap that I have bought that is just like it says absorbent. I am very happy with my purchase, it fits well the wrap stays on and it's highly absorbent. My dog has urinary incontinence most of the time and one rap will last at least 8 hours. It does not leak I am so thankful. Size is true to the fit. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Aprill Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Sure
customer_reviews.text: My dog would keep making eye contact with me as he peed on the floor in the morning. Two or three more times of that and I might’ve no longer enjoyed my ritualistic consumption of 5-egg provolone omelettes. Nothing was working. Floor pads, t-shirts draped over him, prayers to ancient beings who cannot be comprehended. Then it hit me. A dog diaper. So after spending my life savings trying to invent one, I gave up and bought these. They’re quite functional and aesthetically pleasing. My family is in severe debt for my folly. I am 27 years old.
customer_reviews.author: I am very serious

customer_reviews.title: Have continually purchased, and will again if my next dog ever needs them
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's a velcro kind of adhesive, makes it more secure, plus that makes it so you can put it on and off several times throughout the day to take your dog potty if he hasn't already had an accident in it. Fits well and if you don't need it to cover your dogs bottom, is much easier than the diapers you have to get your dogs tail in and out of a small hole
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H.

customer_reviews.title: Works, however  I find dog diapers to be overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: These work as expected but for the price, I just buy regular baby diapers and put them on sideways. They achieve the same effect for a much better value. I just use these when I have him at dog sitter because they super easy to put on and look a little nice with the cure design Baby diaper turned sideways: 30 for 7.99 Dog diaper: does same. iz more ExPen$ive
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Works great wish they were still free shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, work so much better then the ones with two tabs. Only complaint is after first order with free shipping they added shipping to it and now I spend as much as I do when buying locally and with how long they take if shipping is included not worth it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great when they were cheaper
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time i bought any wraps because my lil guy likes to mark. Every night I would wake up to put the diaper back on because he wriggled himself out of it. I wish they would fit a bit better, He also seemed to get his peeper out of the pad as well and continue to mark. I can't buy these for the price tag, for how many we go through.
customer_reviews.author: Sherona

customer_reviews.title: super product.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My puppy is only 6+ pounds, but has several health issues and is on steroids and pees a lot. During the day we don't have a problem, but at night he either doesn't realize he is peeing or just doesn't wake us, maybe to urgent. Anyway, these hold a lot and get us through the night without any messes. I tried another brand and they weren't absorbent enought, had leaks. These also secure really well, all the way across instead to 2 tape strips. Highly recommend and not to terribly expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Best out of all the other brands that’s for sure. I wish that jerk dog of mine didn’t need them. But that little bastard won’t stop pissing in the house. One improvement would be maybe a fresh scent. Or maybe an optional butt flap to catch poop because that little f#%ker likes to do that too
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Best doggie diaper ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I have a nearly 15 year old shitzu that has periods of incontinence. I tried washable diapers but all that did was soak through immediately and would get the dog and everything he layed on wet. This diaper keeps him dry even though multiple pees while I'm not home. It's impressive how much it holds and everything stays dry! Plus it has blue poka dots on it that makes it look cute. Already bought 2 more packages
customer_reviews.author: KevO

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: These work Fantastic! I have a little rescue Chihuahua who apparently was not trained to Not hike his leg in the house. These are a lifesaver! I don't have to follow him around the house now making sure he doesn't make a mess. They are very absorbant. Easy to put on with the Velcro. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Dupree

customer_reviews.title: These were for my 15 year old Maltese, Bentley ...
customer_reviews.text: These were for my 15 year old Maltese, Bentley. He is a little less than 11 pounds. He has plenty of room and they never bothered him once. I probably could have gotten the small size, but I wasn't sure. The medium can be tightened to fit perfectly. I also use cheap pantiliners in them so he never has to be soaking wet and I get more use out of the diapers that way
customer_reviews.author: Linda Truhe

customer_reviews.title: Work great. Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Have a 14 yr old Chorkie who can't hold it anymore. He's 7 lbs and it fits perfect for him. Would work for a little larger dog too. He didn't mind it the first day but got a little grumpy putting it on the next day
customer_reviews.author: SherryKing

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but very good.
customer_reviews.text: 90% of time this are perfect for catching urine. Sometimes my boys get out of the diapers. Sometimes they manage to pee outside their diapers. If they go over night, I often wake up to a soaked diaper and they have developed matting along the sides and smell like pee, but compared to other diapers... these are the best thus far. I’ve been using them for 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 13 yr old miniature schnauzer has become incontinent and ...
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yr old miniature schnauzer has become incontinent and these diapers work perfectly to keep him as a house dog. They hold a large amount of urine and don’t leak. They also keep the wetness away from his skin so there is no issue with skin breakdown or rashes.
customer_reviews.author: Cbest

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Although these did work better than other ones I purchased previously, they still did not stay on my dog. We have a 13 year old chihuahua with a sort of hump on his spine. These wraps slide off . I dont know if its because of his smooth coat or because his little hips are narrow. If you have an elderly dog with hip or waist problems watch out for the sliding. Other than that i say these are pretty good. Just have to figure out how to keep them on while he wanders around .
customer_reviews.author: BBAARBBZZ

customer_reviews.title: is about 1 inch smaller than Vet's Best. The actual area that captures the urine is ...
customer_reviews.text: Going back to the brand I bought which cost a little more. The medium in Out! is about 1 inch smaller than Vet's Best. The actual area that captures the urine is a lot smaller as well. My dog would rub on a chair and these would come right off. Never had that happen with Vet's Best.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Better than the other small diapers
customer_reviews.text: WE have a old yorkie that pees on everything (male) we used other brands but these seem to work better. The others were too small. Saves us tons of time cleaning up his markings. Cons: He doesn't really like them too much but oh well Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: JLSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: These wraps are great! We have an 11 y/o male Yorkie who "marks" constantly and these wraps have proven to be invaluable. They are so easy to put on and off and our Yorkie doesn't seem to mind wearing them in the least. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I love taking my 8 lb. Yorkie with me, but as good as he is about not peeing in his own house, I just can't trust him at other places. This diaper allows me to set him down without a worry. I'm sure the people we visit feel reassured as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jody H

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Basics are better than these but they do the trick.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon Basics are better than these but they do the trick. Only problem is that the velcro does not wrap all the way around the side that closes so its easy for the dog to take it off. I learned to tuck it / wrap around the bottom wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Best wraps on market!
customer_reviews.text: We use these at night, during car rides, and on the go for our new fur baby. We saved him from the crate life and he is still house training. These saved us from the Hartz leaks. I use a belly band to keep him from chewing through and causing a leak
customer_reviews.author: Shadow TechFX

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, but too pricey to use on a regular basis
customer_reviews.text: These came in handy when my dog's cloth belly bands were waiting to be washed. I liked them, but they're too pricey to use on a regular basis. My dog doesn't have "accidents", he gets excited when someone is coming or leaving and will pee on a something he shouldn't be peeing on, so I know if I put it on him, it will get soiled... and that's how I know they won't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Would not stick! had to duct tape them on my dog!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my old incontinent dog. I was thrilled at the price so I bought three packages but ended up they wouldn't stick well and would fall off. I duct taped them on him and then would rip them off him when they got wet. Never bought them again.
customer_reviews.author: katyop

customer_reviews.title: pup ripped it within 2 seconds
customer_reviews.text: the material is not sturdy enough, i put it on my maltese, he turned around and bit it and it ripped very easily, threw them out and got a fabric wrap instead
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W

customer_reviews.title: The size is a little off. This doesn't fit ...
customer_reviews.text: The size is a little off. This doesn't fit my Westies but it does fit my Maltese mix. I would give it 5 stars if the sizing was correct. These run very small for a medium, I would order these for my Maltese instead and go with the other brand for mediums which I believe are true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Great Diaper
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 year old that takes a pill to make him pee. Sometimes he cant get out fast enough and will pee inside. These diapers are great. They hold quite a bit of fluid.
customer_reviews.author: CEP

customer_reviews.title: Floor savers!
customer_reviews.text: I have a male dachshund. He is 15. He was peeing everywhere. These are a floor saver. I recommend using suspenders with them to hold them on. You just need a clip on strap from collar to diaper. They are very absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: PeachyGramma

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My dog has accidents when he gets excited about seeing people. We use these when he goes to other houses as guests just in case. When he was a pup and piddled more often these always held without leaks. Now they are just more of a protection. They don’t seem to bother him at all either.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: It leaks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our very old Chihuahua that can’t hold his bladder anymore. Big waste of money. The pee leaks out and it isn’t absorbant. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good for elderly dogs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my very elderly poodle. He sometimes can't make it outside in time to urinate. These work perfectly for overnight use. They are easy to apply, and stay where they need to be. He doesn't seem to mind them being on.
customer_reviews.author: ChloeSi

customer_reviews.title: ... pack we ordered had a velcro strip which worked great and we loved them
customer_reviews.text: First pack we ordered had a velcro strip which worked great and we loved them. Then I ordered three more packs and these all had two velcro tabs instead of the strip that don't say in place and the diapers were much longer than the first pack - the latter ones wrapped around our Lhasa about 1 1/2 times so often the ends would stick get pulled out the sides. Would reorder what I had the first time, definitely wouldn't order again what we got the second time.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Avoid This Product!! Get Amazon Generics. WAY better
customer_reviews.text: Poor absorption quantity 18 pound dog had it saturated in n an hour! Generic Amazon product is far superior! Outer wrapper is smooth vinyl and Velcro suspenders can’t adhere to it. Just a poor (overpriced) product
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Lowell

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: OMG these have saved me so much grief! I wish I though to if years ago. They are spendy but as another reviewer stated, I took her advise and put feminine pads in to help the wraps last longer. We only use 2 diapers a day but go through at about 5 pads a day.
customer_reviews.author: FurBabyMom

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I ended up donating these because my dog wouldn't keep them on. The tabs stayed on for a couple hours but then would loosen with movement and my boy would pull them off.
customer_reviews.author: sugar magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Great wraps
customer_reviews.text: wraps worked great was just a little difficult to pull apart to stick. You have to pull from the underside, if you try and pull it apart from the top it rips.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: XS and was too big for my minpin mix but ok for my Jack Russell mix. Absorbancy was ok but they are very thin and not breathable material. Velcro portion separates from the diaper easily which is no good for active pups.
customer_reviews.author: greyeyz

customer_reviews.title: Not as Good a Product as Amazon's!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product for my senior dog that suffers from incontinence. The price was cheaper than the Amazon brand and I could see why. The brand from Amazon is far superior in fit and absorption. Not worth the cheaper price. Just my 2 cents! (-:
customer_reviews.author: Charlene A. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My little 17 year old Maltipoo is pretty much inconstant. He sleeps in these every night and wakes up with a the diaper full of pee. These so absorbent that my dog is not saturated in urine. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: J. zaitz

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: They do run small. I have a 13 lb poodle and he wears a medium. In his old age he cannot hold his urine while we are at work. We tried creating and other brands of diapers. This is the only one we found that covers what needs to be covered and lasts all day, even while he is rolling all around trying to take it off. We have been using these faithfully for about a year now. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Finally sleeping through the night!
customer_reviews.text: One of our dogs has Type 1 Diabetes and Cushing's Disease, resulting in his drinking quantities of water and being somewhat incontinent. These wraps cost a fraction of what I paid in pet supply stores. Just knowing that any accident will be contained in this wrap, as opposed to being in our carpet (despite available pee pee pads) lets me sleep through the night!
customer_reviews.author: Hope Guajardo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Absorbent, full coverage, and I LOVE the single, wide velcro strip. Fine motor skills are painful for me and those other wraps with two strips of velcro are difficult for me to put on wriggling dogs. Also, they bulge and tend to shift on my dogs. These FINALLY put an end to my stubborn Shih Tzus thinking the house is their toilet. I will happily keep my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Mordant

customer_reviews.title: These are the best by far
customer_reviews.text: We use these at night for our little 17 year old Silky because he sleeps so sound he often doesn't wake up in time to get to the doggie door.. They are very absorbent and easy on and off. We call them his "pajamas". He sleeps comfortably without a tight, wide band around his body. Great product!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Quality has went down hill...
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for a few years now and typically spend a few hundred dollars a year...these used to be a great product but something has changed with quality and the price has increased...the actual diaper material is very thin and can be torn very easily...really disappointed in whatever changed...
customer_reviews.author: Brent Hensley

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my soon to be 4 yr old rescue. They’re super absorbent, easy to use, and a huge life saver. We switch between these and the washables but these always seem to win with him. Definitely purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: K.Cantrelle

customer_reviews.title: Good if priced right
customer_reviews.text: Do what they're supposed to. Fall off quite easily but then they all do. When priced right they're well worth it, but at the moment I can get others cheaper and they are basically the same.
customer_reviews.author: YnotMe

customer_reviews.title: Great for your male fur babies
customer_reviews.text: Have a 16 yr old Sheltie that can't hold himself nor does he tell us when he has to go. These male wraps works wonders! I used to use reg. doggie diapers but when he moved around the diaper would slip backwards and we'd have a mess to clean up. Not with the male wraps, they're easy to put on and they stay in place!!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Decent product and price, but run smaller than other brands
customer_reviews.text: Run smaller than other brands and no wetness indicator on the product. Guess my fault on the size, but the don't offer anything larger than a medium and a medium on the other brands are about two inches longer than these wraps. If you have a dog whose waist measures more than maybe 18 or 19 inches max, then these are too small for your little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: Not what I envisioned
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculous design. It's basically like a belt that wraps over the male dogs junk. It is NOT like diaper. Seldom stays on. Half the time when it stayed on, it got jostled and wasn't covering what needed to be covered. Don't waste your money unless you have a super passive inactive dog. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Yokozuna

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like how these diapers keep from leaking with a yorkie that is constantly trying to mark his territory in the house. I buy them by the bundle to help with not running out of them throughout the 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Moonshine in the Sun Rays

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I've tried several brands & like these the best. I buy on average 4 packages every month or so depending on how many my dog goes through. I highly recommend these. I wish though they offered better deals for loyal customers rather than only getting a little savings on when you have to commit to a time frame for pre orders which I don't want to do.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Fastener sucks, but with some duct tape it does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Works great (much better than nothing), but the fastener sucks if you have a squirmy houdini type dog. I use a strip of duct tape so it can't be loosened by my dog (and consequently not work), and haven't had any issues with it as long as the duct tape holds. I wish I could find a larger package of these to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer of Things

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: These are some pretty decent doggy diapers but the closer doesn't stay. My dog can roll over on his back or stretch and it pops right off. I am keeping them to use as a backup if we run out of the other ones we ordered from Vet's Best.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel F. P

customer_reviews.title: brand is the a very good product for less money
customer_reviews.text: We have been using disposable diapers on our aging dog for about a year. Out of all the diapers we tried, the OUT! brand is the a very good product for less money. Although it does not have an indicator that measures how wet the diaper is, common sense can be used as to how often you need to change your dog's pants.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia Bozeman

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stay on
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 6 lb chihuahua male because he hasn't been able to hold his bladder through the night. After the first night, he figured out how to get out of them and I started using masking tape to keep them on. That worked for two nights and then no matter what I did, he got them off. I think the size is just too big and wish they had a smaller size for the little guys. I donated them to my shelter, but I won't be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Rudd

customer_reviews.title: Way over priced
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! They run small. I buy the medium for my taller 9lb chihuahua. they are super absorbent and stay put. They are much better than the other more expensive brand by far! However, they are no longer on Prime and are definitely not worth the outrageous shipping. FYI major retailers sell them for the same price, minus shipping.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: If you have to buy doggie diapers, these are the best.
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty great, as far as dog diapers go. I just discovered that they are the same price at my local Walmart though. I try not to shop there, so I'll continue to buy them on Amazon, but I wish they would drop the price a little to compete. If you have to go into Walmart, you have to be surrounded by Walmart people, so shopping online will always be my first choice 😁
customer_reviews.author: Susan Keene

customer_reviews.title: Easy to remove from dog
customer_reviews.text: The disposable diaper is easier for the fact you take off and throw away, unlike the washable diapers. One downfall I see is that sometimes they tend to fall off if dog gets overexcited (like running for a doorbell ring, or jumping on and off the couch). Easy to remove from dog, and no leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for long periods of time
customer_reviews.text: They served their purpose but didn’t hold that much so you are changing them constantly. And when it was full my dog ripped them off and shredded them to pieces everywhere so if you didn’t keep a close eye and change it he would just rip it off so I guess it was uncomfortable for him when it was full.
customer_reviews.author: Rhianna

customer_reviews.title: A must have for dogs who can't hold it anymore
customer_reviews.text: Our 12 year old Min Pin has diabetes and these are by far the best diapers on the market, and the cheapest Our Walmart sells them but they are almost always sold out. You get more diapers for less and these are Velcro, not the tape like a baby diaper. They can be undone and redone with out any problems. We have saved a ton of paper towels cleaning floors and a lot of time from steam cleaning
customer_reviews.author: jamie langella

customer_reviews.title: Bargain Doggy Diapers
customer_reviews.text: These are a bargain, and they fit our 14 pound poodle (bless his little incontinent self) quite well. The price is significantly cheaper than others online here as well as those available at Petsmart.
customer_reviews.author: Va Belle

customer_reviews.title: I recommend for anyone who has a little dog that is ...
customer_reviews.text: Our dog (mini Schnauzer) has constant leaking bladder issues. These wraps make it so I don't have to wash his bedding everyday and he can be in the house more. I recommend for anyone who has a little dog that is aging...don't give up on them just because they have accidents....they have many years ahead of them. With these wraps my dog can be back to his regular indoor activities. I wish I learned about them earlier.
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good doggy diaper
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I foster dogs and most of them are not potty trained when they come to me and these have been great with helping potty train. Most of the dogs don’t mind them. Easy to use and put on and they don’t fall off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: " male dog diapers used to work great - however they changed the design a little but ...
customer_reviews.text: The "OUT!" male dog diapers used to work great - however they changed the design a little but it made a huge difference in the performance. The adhesive strip was recently substantially reduced in length from before which has severely changed the product. Now the diaper tends to bunch up on the bottom after just a few minutes which enables the pup to wee on the floor. This causes me to need to change the diaper at least three times as often.
customer_reviews.author: Max A

customer_reviews.title: Great absorbency and fit.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is getting older and having some accidents and I have never seen these. They are fabulous. Great absorbency and comfortable fit. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Martyn

customer_reviews.title: Stays on my little escape artist!
customer_reviews.text: These work well for my senior dog, but when I work late they don't keep him dry enough and his fur ends up soaked. But they work better than most brands, and he can't get out of these - major plus!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Jackson

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best wraps! I have used other disposable wraps, as well as washable ones, and these are superior by a long shot. They're thin which allows my dog to get up and down the stairs in them. Other brands are so bulky I would have to carry him up/down the stairs. These allow him to move much more naturally. Also they're soft and quiet - he doesn't seem to mind them and I don't hear the rustling sound at night like I did when we've used other brands. And you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great diapers but my dog takes them off every time 🤦‍♀️ I put them on him whenever I leave the house so I reuse them. I take them on and off a few times a day so I use the same one. Unfortunately he wiggles out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 year old chihuahua that is having bladder issues. He’s only 5lbs so it’s super hard finding wraps to fit. This did what they were supposed to do but we’re still too big for him.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McQueen

customer_reviews.title: My 17yr. old Pomeranian "Max" has his dignity again!
customer_reviews.text: I used to wake up and step into a "mess" occasionally on our hardwood floor. No more! Not only does he not leave any surprises anymore, but it seems to remind him "joy comes with the morning" and that he can wait till we get up to let him out. When he does, the diaper can be reused the next night. They fit him and stay on with no leaks. I like the color change band for quick checks too. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: These work well for my newly addopted (and not potty ...
customer_reviews.text: These work well for my newly addopted (and not potty trained senior pup). I didn't experience any leaking issues. Ordered one size up but they were snug around the waist. The cost is comparable to those found at popular dog stores. I found the cost quickly add ups therefore we switched to washable diapers and use inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Dalila Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: So these work. I mean need I say more? Lol so I use them on my 20 lb miniature poodle puppy who’s 12 and a old age has got him leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Great for Male dogs.. a Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: These belly bands are great... my 16.5 year old male dog has canine cognitive disfunction and is not always sure where he is and started peeing in the house... these work great to take the worry away if we are out for too long or if he sleeps for a long time... if it stays dry, we simply reuse it with the Velcro tab it can be put back on.
customer_reviews.author: Lois J VanMeurs

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this product got one star is because you cannot leave a review with no stars. Don't waste your money they have not made a product for boy dogs that works and this is one of those. It does not stay in place. every time I came home the diaper would be somewhere else and the dog would be laying in a puddle of pee. Even with it on the minute he curls up his penis sticks right out of it. They are garbage.
customer_reviews.author: sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: This worked just right. The only thing I would comment negatively on is “Why only 96 per pack......why not an even 100 for the same price?
customer_reviews.author: Sass3

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and absorbent. Diaper area unfolds easily to cover genitals. The closure method could be improved, feel it could be larger.
customer_reviews.author: woodsmans wife

product_meta.title: OUT! Disposable Male Dog Diapers | Absorbent Male Wraps with Leak Protection | Excitable Urination, Incontinence, or Male Marking
product_meta.description:
Pattern Name:XS/S| Size:12 ctSuper absorbent diapers made to fit the rascaliest of tail-waggers, OUT! Disposable Male Wraps will keep your doggy’s piddles contained. 
No more frustration from fido marking in the house, and no more inconvenience from an incontinent pooch. Fur-safe, repositionable closures mean comfort for him, while keeping your house free from pee. 
These male wraps are super-absorbant with leak-proof barriers that are guaranteed to work everytime.
feature_bullets: DESIGNED FOR MALE DOGS – Keep your dog comfortable and dry with XS/Small OUT! PetCare Disposable Male Wraps. Designed specially to fit male dogs with a 13-18-inch waist.
LEAK-PROOF FIT - Super absorbent core quickly wicks moisture and keeps dogs dry while leak-proof side barriers keep liquids contained.
WETNESS INDICATOR- Changes colors when the male dog diaper is wet, so you know when it is time to change your pup.
FUR-SAFE FASTENERS – Repositionable fasteners secure the perfect fit and won’t stick to your dog’s fur.
NO MESS - OUT! PetCare Disposable Male Wraps provide protection for urinary incontinence, male marking, excitable urination and travel. For female dogs, try OUT! PetCare Disposable Dog Diapers.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
